# NSNull

**Class**

A singleton object used to represent null values in collection objects that don’t allow `nil` values.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSNull
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNull] is “toll-free bridged” with its Core Foundation counterpart, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNull]. See [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/CocoaEncyclopedia/Toll-FreeBridgin/Toll-FreeBridgin.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40010810-CH2] for more information on toll-free bridging.

## Special Semantic Values

- **NSNotFound**
- **NSNotFound**: A value indicating that a requested item couldn’t be found or doesn’t exist.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CAAction
- CVarArg
- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
